output `top1Df` should be explained in the description. Also, note about `tail-k` computation should be documented. Please add `docs/gitbook/spark/topkjoin.md` that explains usage of this function.

BTW, I personally prefer `top_k_join` instead of `join_top_k`.

@maropu Thanks! Merged.
@myui Many Thanks!

@maropu LGTM. Please merge this PR and close the JIRA ticket.

Also, please update https://github.com/apache/incubator-hivemall-site as well.
Do we need to update the site every gitbook modified?
Merged
@maropu unfortunately, we have to do it manually. We cannot use github hooks in ASF repository.
What I meant is that it's enough to update them just before Apache GA releases?
@maropu anytime you want but we need to make the project site up-to-date for each release.
okay, I got it.

@maropu Could you add missing license header to updated `*.md`?
Currently, travis CI is failing due to that.

Please perform ` mvn license:check; mvn license:format`.

BTW, no need to create a JIRA issue for the hotfix.
It seems your commit makes test fail, Why do we need `misc.md`? https://github.com/apache/incubator-hivemall/commit/4909deda546946a66de31195b9a3eaa120382c50#diff-3b8b2ffac8e90873350a4d049de9b854

Fixed in https://github.com/apache/incubator-hivemall/commit/fdb4dd86965f8b79f6dc257a783e683c93fadc43

It's required for gitbook menu http://hivemall.incubator.apache.org/userguide/spark/misc/misc.html
okay, thanks
Benchmark on more large dataset would be helpful (not to be included the unit test though).

I'm not sure whether these functions should add to `define-all.spark`:
https://github.com/apache/incubator-hivemall/blob/master/resources/ddl/define-all.hive#L467-L483

Aha, can you replace `RowIdUDF` with `RowIdUDFWrapper`?: https://github.com/apache/incubator-hivemall/blob/master/spark/spark-common/src/main/java/hivemall/tools/mapred/RowIdUDFWrapper.java
And then, you can remove all the entries there except for `rowid`.

OK, 
`hivemall.smile.regression.RandomForestRegressionUDTF` create 2 functions. `define-all.spark` also add them?
https://github.com/apache/incubator-hivemall/blob/master/resources/ddl/define-all.hive#L607-L611
yea, please.
OK, all done
@myui No, you can't access `TaskContext` inside `HiveUDF`.
